<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script">
    <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <abort_action>false</abort_action>
        <access>package_private</access>
        <action_delete>false</action_delete>
        <action_insert>true</action_insert>
        <action_query>false</action_query>
        <action_update>true</action_update>
        <active>true</active>
        <add_message>false</add_message>
        <advanced>true</advanced>
        <change_fields>false</change_fields>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <collection>release_feature</collection>
        <condition/>
        <description/>
        <execute_function>false</execute_function>
        <filter_condition/>
        <is_rest>false</is_rest>
        <message/>
        <name>SNC Release feature events</name>
        <order>100</order>
        <priority/>
        <rest_method/>
        <rest_method_text/>
        <rest_service/>
        <rest_service_text/>
        <rest_variables/>
        <role_conditions/>
        <script><![CDATA[// create release feature 
 
var name = 'release_feature';
simple_events(current);

if (!current.assigned_to.nil() && current.assigned_to.changes()) {
   gs.eventQueue(name + ".assigned", current, current.assigned_to.getDisplayValue(), 
                   previous.assigned_to.getDisplayValue());
}


/**

if (current.active.changesTo(false)) {
   gs.eventQueue(name + ".inactive", current, current.incident_state, previous.incident_state);
	

}

**/


if (current.workflow_state.changes()) {
   gs.eventQueue(name + ".state.change", current, current.workflow_state, previous.workflow_state);
}

if (current.percent_complete == 100) {
   gs.eventQueue(name + ".complete", current, current.percent_complete, previous.percent_complete);
}


// do the inserted, updated events
function simple_events(current) {
 var name = 'release_feature';

 if (current.operation() == 'insert') {
  gs.eventQueue(name + ".inserted", current, gs.getUserID(), gs.getUserName());
 }

 if (current.operation() == 'update') {
  gs.eventQueue(name +".updated", current, gs.getUserID(), gs.getUserName());
 }
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2006-05-07 07:15:40</sys_created_on>
        <sys_domain>global</sys_domain>
        <sys_domain_path/>

        <sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SNC Release feature events</sys_name>
        <sys_overrides/>
        <sys_package display_value="Release Management" source="com.snc.release_management">0486f4243cb1311068bcf327dfe37f8f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_0db394a30a0a0a0a00b09f684f9fb9c3</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2017-07-25 10:33:21</sys_updated_on>
        <template/>
        <when>after</when>
    </sys_script>
    <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0db394a30a0a0a0a00b09f684f9fb9c3"/>
</record_update>
